# vite-vui-poc

## INTRODUCTION

The HelloWorld demo based on VUI (Vue 3) with Vite 4. Try [StackBlitz](https://stackblitz.com/github/v-poc/vui-poc?file=package.json) or try [vui-poc SFC playground](https://sfc.vuejs.org/#).

> VUI contains Mobile web UI components based on Vue 3.

## Project setup

### How to setup your project

```
npm install
```

### Compiles and hot-reloads for development

```
npm run dev
```

### Compiles and minifies for production

```
npm run build
```

### Customize configuration

About vite, please check Configuration Reference - [vite](https://vitejs.dev/config/).
